doc:
Wesley Snipes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wesley_Snipes 0 Wesley Trent Snipes (born July 31, 1962) is an American actor, film producer, martial artist, and author. His prominent film roles include Major League (1989), Mo' Better Blues (1990), New Jack City (1991), White Men Can't Jump (1992), Demolition Man (1993), and the Marvel Comics character Blade in the Blade film trilogy (1998–2004). He formed a production company, Amen-Ra Films, in 1991, and a subsidiary, Black Dot Media, to develop projects for film and television. He has been training in martial arts since the age of 12, earning a 5th dan black belt in Shotokan Karate and 2nd dan black belt in Hapkido.In 2010, Snipes began serving a three-year prison sentence in McKean County, Pennsylvania for misdemeanor failure to file U.S. federal income tax returns. He was released from prison in 2013. Wesley_Trent_Snipes ( born July_31_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor , film_producer , martial_artist , and author . His_prominent_film_roles include Major_League ( 1989_) , Mo '_Better_Blues_(_1990_) , New_Jack_City ( 1991_) , White_Men Ca_n't_Jump (_1992_)_,_Demolition_Man_(_1993_) , and the_Marvel_Comics_character_Blade in the_Blade_film_trilogy_(_1998 – 2004_) . He formed a_production_company , Amen-Ra_Films , in 1991 , and a_subsidiary , Black_Dot_Media , to_develop projects for film_and_television . He has_been_training in martial_arts since the_age of 12 , earning a_5th_dan_black_belt in Shotokan_Karate and 2nd_dan_black_belt in Hapkido.In_2010 , Snipes began_serving a_three-year_prison_sentence in McKean_County , Pennsylvania for misdemeanor_failure to_file U.S._federal_income_tax_returns . He was_released from prison in 2013 .
